The video was published on January 29: 2021, in a Facebook post with a caption in Hindi that mentioned a revolt in Delhi Police and the resignation of 200 policemen.
Rakesh Tikait: the leader and spokesman of the farmers' protest, was mentioned in the caption, suggesting a connection between the video and the ongoing protests against new agricultural laws.
At different points in the video: a senior police officer can be heard asking the policemen to chant "Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan" (Hail the Soldier, Hail the Farmer), a slogan coined by former Indian prime minister Lal Bahadur Shastri to praise the contribution of soldiers and farmers in nation building.
